attributes.additional_details:
We need to have more food options in the supermarket at an affordable price. 
When traveling to another EU country, waiting time should be reduced, we should not be made to feel that we are second class citizens.
Tax on import to the UK should not be passed on to the customers who cannot even afford it.
When visiting EU countries Uk citizens are at the back of the queue, it's now taking hours to go through custom, when prior to Brexit this would take minutes.
attributes.background:
I feel there were exaggerations on the benefits of leaving the European Union, none of these benefit has materialised. 
Food prices has increased, shelves are left empty in supermarkets. I feel we were lied to by politicians for their own benefits and the UK people.

rejection.details: Seek to rejoin the European Union: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/661082
